# Data processing

```{r}
data <- read_excel("~/UNIL 2021/Programming_tools/project--G4/nasty.xlsx") %>% rename("Request"= "...1")


data$Measure1 <- as.double(data$Measure1)
data$Measure2 <- as.double(data$Measure2)
data$Measure3 <- as.double(data$Measure3)
data$Measure4 <- as.double(data$Measure4)
data$Measure5 <- as.double(data$Measure5)
data$Measure6 <- as.double(data$Measure6)
data$Tare <- as.double(data$Tare)
data$Target.Value <- as.double(data$Target.Value)
data_try<- data
```



# summary_stat
illustrate the funtion

```{r}

library(pkgproject)
summary_stat(data_try,1)
```

# request_CL

```{r}
request_CL(data_try,1)
```
